scripts.db:info: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI).then(async () => { const Restaurant = require('./models/Restaurant'); const User = require('./models/User'); const restaurants = await Restaurant.countDocuments(); const users = await User.countDocuments(); console.log('ðŸ“Š Database Info:'); console.log('Restaurants:', restaurants); console.log('Users:', users); if (restaurants > 0) { const restList = await Restaurant.find().select('name'); console.log('Restaurant names:', restList.map(r => r.name)); } process.exit(0); })"
